sentence: FIRST ON FOX: Firebrand Rep. Madison Cawthorn is endorsing Ohio Senate candidate Josh Mandel Monday as yet another national figure gets involved in the Buckeye State's high-profile GOP primary.
author: Tyler Olson
title: Ohio GOP Senate showdown: Firebrand Rep. Cawthorn endorses Josh Mandel in crowded Republican primary

sentence: Mandel has also been endorsed by North Carolina Rep. Madison Cawthorn, who has received criticism from a larger swath of Republicans for recent comments, including one in which he called Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy a thug.? Utah Sen. Mike Lee, a conservative ally of Cruz, is also supporting Mandel.
author: AP
title: Cruz endorses Josh Mandel in Ohio's crowded Senate primary
